task.summary: Changing the Example app to a real one, but it is not working. There is a problem with the Files and Directories' names.
App Working. Pending image processing and sending
Cleaning the project's classes. They were a real mess!
Adding interaction with openCV. Added new activity, now the camera is used by the app.
Basic Flow working. Next step: send the picture

Usability improved. Now the system sends the contour of the image
